Text: Project Proposal Cc Attached is a project summary it captures what we heard from you guys abou t theworkforce stability inRisk Management Gasand our propose d solution Please review and let me know if you have any amendments Regards Melissa Prihoda EWS Organizational Development and Training x

Analysts Cc Phillip Can we get together on Thursday or Friday to discuss the Utility Track for the new Analysts that will join your group this summer The objective of this track is to have the analysts serve in a Business Unit but rotate functionroles as needs change We need to identify responsibilities the analysts could have at each desk Please let me know what time works best for you Regards Melissa Prihoda
